author: Chris Kirkham
title: Wynn Resorts Swings to Loss
text:
Wynn Resorts Ltd. swung to a loss in its latest quarter after booking a one-time charge related to a legal settlement that paved the way for Steve Wynn to sell his stake in the company he co-founded.
The casino giant’s new chief executive, Matt Maddox, said on an earnings call Tuesday he is “not interested in looking in the rearview mirror,” referring to sexual-misconduct allegations against Mr. Wynn in recent months, and is “as excited as ever about the future prospects of this company.”
...
